docs.text: Hi, My name is Vũ Quang Trọng . You can call me Henry as many foreigners cannot pronounce the dropping tone mark . I am working in Embedded Automotive field, mainly focusing on In Vehicle Infortainment (IVI) and Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems (ADAS). I do some personal projects for my home, and some others as my freelancing jobs. This is blog is created to store pieces of knowledge I have learned from my work while doing projects, as I cannot remember all of them. I also want to share to all of you, wish you find them somehow helpful. Let's be awesome ^^ Contact me: vuquangtrong@gmail.com

docs.text: The KBD Extension is an inline processor for adding markdown syntax for inline <kbd> tags. Text wrapped in double brackets [[ button ]] , double braces {{ menu }} , or double parenthesis (( action )) will be wrapped with an HTML <kbd> tag.
